Name: Silver Wire
About the game: 'Silver Wire' is an action game where you can enjoy defeating enemies with wires. The purpose of this game is to kill as many enemies as possible. Player Actions: - Bind and cut monsters. Stages: - 1. Night Hall (zombie, bat) - 2. Butterfly cage (zombie, butterfly) - 3. Jellyfish Aquarium (zombie, jellyfish) - 4. Knight Hall (zombie, knight) Rules: - If you touch an enemy, you will be damaged. - The first damage is prevented by the shield, but the second is game over. - The shield will heal when you defeat 100 enemies. You are free to make gameplay videos and stream live.
